decks.notes: This deck focuses on using a variety of control cards to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also utilizing powerful multicolor cards such as Solitude, Omnath, Locus of Creation, and Teferi, Time Raveler to maintain board presence and generate value. The deck also includes Leyline Binding to lock down specific threats and Prismatic Ending for versatile removal. The inclusion of The One Ring allows for card advantage and additional control elements. With a mix of creature removal, card draw, and powerful threats, this deck aims to control the game and outvalue the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with key creatures using cards like Street Wraith and Architects of Will, then casting Living End to bring them all back onto the battlefield at once. This combo can overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and disrupt their game plan. The deck also includes control elements like Force of Negation to protect the combo and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By effectively managing resources and timing, the deck aims to create a board state that is difficult for the opponent to overcome.

The deck focuses on using the Amulet of Vigor to generate extra mana and play multiple lands per turn. This allows for quick ramping into powerful spells like Primeval Titan and The One Ring. The deck also utilizes the synergy between lands and artifacts to create a potent combo engine that can overwhelm opponents with big creatures and powerful abilities. The key strategy is to assemble the pieces of the combo quickly and efficiently to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent.

This deck focuses on assembling a toolbox of creatures that can be searched for and played strategically using cards like Chord of Calling and Eldritch Evolution. By utilizing creatures with powerful abilities, such as Yawgmoth, Thran Physician and Grist, the Hunger Tide, the deck aims to create powerful synergies that can disrupt the opponent's game plan and generate value over time. The deck also includes ways to generate additional value through sacrificing creatures, such as with Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Blood Artist, while maintaining a strong mana base with a mix of lands and mana dorks.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana using lands like Urza's Tower, Mine, and Power Plant, along with Eldrazi Temple, to play big, impactful creatures like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer. The deck also includes powerful artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Mind Stone to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. With access to cards like Ugin, the Spirit Dragon and All Is Dust, the deck aims to clear the opponent's board and secure the win through aggressive Eldrazi creatures.

The deck focuses on quickly bringing powerful creatures back from the graveyard, taking advantage of their enter the battlefield effects and disrupting the opponent's game plan with hand disruption and removal spells. A key strategy involves using Goryo's Vengeance to cheat out creatures like Griselbrand and Fallaji Archaeologist, while also utilizing cards like Faithful Mending and Ephemerate to effectively reanimate and protect key pieces. The deck also aims to control the board with cards like Solitude and Prismatic Ending, allowing the player to set up their combo pieces and dominate the game.

This deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard using spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence. By combining instant reanimation with disruptive creatures like Grief and Ephemerate, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while quickly establishing a powerful board presence. Momentary Blink and Solitude provide additional flexibility and removal options, allowing the deck to respond to a variety of threats. A key strategy is to efficiently cycle through the deck using Faithful Mending and Prismatic Ending to find combo pieces and ensure a consistent stream of threats.

This deck aims to reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa quickly through instant spells like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate. Fallaji Archaeologist helps to get back key pieces from the graveyard while disruption is provided by cards like Solitude and Grief. The deck also utilizes cards like Faithful Mending and Tainted Indulgence to cycle through the deck and find combo pieces. With a mix of reanimation and disruptive elements, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and efficient mana usage to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By using a wide range of colors, it can access powerful creatures and support spells to maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional value and flexibility. By utilizing a mix of creatures with different abilities and strong removal spells, this deck aims to dictate the pace of the game and force the opponent to react defensively, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

The main focus of this deck is to ramp up mana quickly using cards like Arboreal Grazer, Dryad of the Ilysian Grove, and Amulet of Vigor, in order to play powerful combo pieces like Primeval Titan and The One Ring. The deck also utilizes lands like Urza's Saga and Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle to generate additional value and win conditions. Additionally, the deck includes utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Tolaria West to protect key combo pieces and find necessary cards. The ultimate goal is to assemble the combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a powerful board state.

The deck revolves around assembling a toolbox of creatures, utilizing Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to sacrifice and manipulate creatures for value. It has a mix of sacrifice outlets, resilient creatures, and combo pieces such as Grist, the Hunger Tide. The deck aims to tutor for specific creatures with Chord of Calling and utilize its creatures' abilities synergistically to control the board and generate value. With a mix of utility lands and mana dorks, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of creatures to create different combo interactions and toolbox options. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician serves as a central piece in the combo potential, while cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Agatha's Soul Cauldron provide additional support and synergy. The creatures in the deck offer versatility and flexibility, allowing for various strategies and tactics to be employed depending on the situation. The deck aims to establish board control and generate value through creature interactions and combo plays, ultimately leading to a winning position.

This deck focuses on utilizing cards like Goryo's Vengeance, Ephemerate, and Tainted Indulgence to quickly and unexpectedly reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand. By using instant-speed reanimation spells and disruptive cards like Grief and Solitude, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while establishing a powerful board presence. Atraxa, Grand Unifier acts as a versatile threat and additional reanimation target, while cards like Fallaji Archaeologist help to recur key pieces from the graveyard. The deck also includes some removal and disruption to control the battlefield and protect its combo pieces.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate in order to overwhelm the opponent with instant creature threats. The deck also utilizes cards like Faithful Mending and Tainted Indulgence to manipulate the graveyard and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The various lands chosen are to provide the necessary color sources for the spells in the deck. Overall, the strategy revolves around fast and unexpected plays to create a strong board presence and win the game.

The focus of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana quickly with cards like Explore and Sakura-Tribe Elder, while also removing threats with Storm's Wrath and Wrenn and Six. The ultimate goal is to assemble the Scapeshift combo, along with Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle, to deal massive damage to the opponent in one turn. The deck also includes cards like The One Ring and Wish to search for key pieces and maintain board presence. The synergy between these cards allows for a powerful and consistent control strategy in a Modern 1 vs 1 format.

This deck aims to use the combination of Underworld Breach and various spell recursion effects to create a looping strategy that allows the player to repeatedly cast spells from their graveyard. By utilizing cheap cantrips and interaction, the deck can dig through its library quickly and disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up a win condition through cards like Thassa's Oracle. The strategy revolves around efficiently utilizing resources from both the graveyard and library to create a powerful and resilient combo engine.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent and win the game as fast as possible. It includes fast and aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt, Lava Spike, and Boros Charm to finish off the opponent. The deck utilizes efficient creatures and burn spells to maintain pressure on the opponent and secure victory before the opponent can stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes lands like Sunbaked Canyon and Fiery Islet to help draw into more threats and spells.

This deck aims to aggressively cast spells with cascade, allowing the player to cheat out powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Crashing Footfalls. By using cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, the deck can overwhelm opponents quickly. The deck also includes cards like Leyline Binding and Endurance to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is designed to support the deck's multicolor spells and includes lands like Misty Rainforest and Wooded Foothills. The key strategy is to deploy threats quickly and efficiently to outpace the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly casting spells with Cascade to flood the board with powerful creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy. By utilizing cards like Shardless Agent and Violent Outburst, along with Lrien Revealed to manipulate cascades, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a constant stream of threats. The inclusion of counter spells like Force of Negation and removal spells like Dead / Gone help to keep the opponent's board in check while setting up for a decisive victory. Overall, the deck is designed to be fast, aggressive, and unpredictable.

This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures with diverse abilities to create powerful combinations and out-value the opponent. By utilizing creature toolbox cards such as Chord of Calling and Grist, the Hunger Tide, the deck can search for specific creatures needed for various situations. Yawgmoth, Thran Physician acts as a powerful engine for card advantage and controlling the board. The deck also includes disruption with Orcish Bowmasters and a win condition with Blood Artist. It aims to create a versatile and resilient board presence to overwhelm the opponent.

This deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently, utilizing low-cost creatures and spells to put pressure on the opponent. By playing aggressively and utilizing powerful creatures like Death's Shadow and Scourge of the Skyclaves, the deck aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total while controlling the board with cards like Thoughtseize and Terminate. The deck also utilizes Grief and Dauthi Voidwalker to disrupt the opponent's game plan and gain additional advantages. Overall, this deck is focused on pushing the opponent into a defensive position and securing a quick victory.

This deck utilizes the powerful Eldrazi creatures and artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher, along with supporting artifacts like Chalice of the Void and Karn, the Great Creator, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong board presence. The use of Urza lands and Eldrazi Temple allows for fast mana acceleration, enabling the deck to play its threats ahead of schedule. This deck is designed to apply pressure early and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on quickly utilizing cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence to reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier from the graveyard, allowing for explosive plays and unexpected threats. The inclusion of cards like Faithful Mending and Ephemerate help with card advantage and protection, while Prismatic Ending and Solitude provide removal options. The deck aims to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with its instant reanimation strategy, making it a formidable force in 1 vs 1 Modern matches.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, then using Goryo's Vengeance and Tainted Indulgence to bring them back onto the battlefield for a powerful and unexpected attack. The inclusion of cards like Faithful Mending and Ephemerate allows for card draw and additional reanimation opportunities, while disruptive cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Negation help to protect the combo. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast reanimation and powerful creatures to secure a win.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Griselbrand and Atraxa by using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Fallaji Archaeologist. The deck also includes several ways to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Grief and Solitude, while also providing card advantage and protection with Faithful Mending and Teferi, Time Raveler. The mana base is optimized for fetching the necessary colors and lands to pull off the combo efficiently. The goal is to set up a quick reanimation combo and overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful one drop and two drop creatures, along with disruptive hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, to apply early pressure on the opponent. It also includes removal spells like Terminate and Fatal Push to maintain control of the board. The deck utilizes the land recursion ability of Wrenn and Six to keep hitting land drops and fueling the aggressive creatures. The inclusion of Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for key artifacts. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient creatures and disruption spells.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using Underworld Breach and Lotus Field to generate significant mana advantage and loop spells through the graveyard. It includes cards that can untap lands, search for key pieces, and manipulate the top of the library to ensure the combo goes off smoothly. The ultimate goal is to win the game quickly by casting a flurry of spells, drawing cards, and ultimately playing Thassa's Oracle to win the game on the spot. The deck is built around efficiency and consistency in executing the combo.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence with aggressive creatures like Martyr of Sands and Solitude, while gaining life to stay ahead of the opponent. The deck also utilizes cards like Abiding Grace and Temporary Lockdown to control the pace of the game and protect your creatures. In addition, there are powerful removal spells like Skyclave Apparition and Winds of Abandon to deal with threats from the opponent. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggro tactics and life gain strategies.

This deck focuses on quickly developing a board presence with powerful Merfolk creatures and controlling the game with disruptive spells like Subtlety and Force of Negation. By leveraging Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and using tribal synergy with cards like Lord of Atlantis and Master of the Pearl Trident, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with efficient beatdowns. The inclusion of utility lands like Cavern of Souls and Mutavault along with versatile creatures like Merfolk Trickster provide additional flexibility and options for maneuvering through various matchups.

The deck focuses on assembling the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, and Tower) to generate a large amount of mana quickly. It then uses that mana to play powerful colorless threats such as Sundering Titan, Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, and Wurmcoil Engine. The deck also includes a number of control elements such as Oblivion Stone and Dismember to deal with opponents' threats. Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon provide additional utility and win conditions. The deck aims to control the game through powerful threats and disruption until it can overwhelm the opponent.

The key concept of this deck is to assemble the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Tower, Power Plant, Mine) to generate massive amounts of mana to play powerful spells like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck utilizes control elements such as Oblivion Stone and Relic of Progenitus to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also featuring powerful win conditions like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Wurmcoil Engine. The deck aims to control the game and overwhelm the opponent with its powerful threats and mana advantage.
